text: Paul Loridant (22 April 1948 - 22 December 2020) was a French politician. He was a member of the Socialist Party. From 1977 to 2008, he was Mayor of Les Ulis. From 1986 until 2004, Loridant was a member of the French Senate. Loridant was born in Ille-sur-Têt, France. Loridant died on 22 December 2020 in Villejuif, France at the age of 72.Essonne : tristesse unanime après la mort de Paul Loridant, maire bâtisseur des Ulis ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French mayors
title: Paul Loridant
